AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Revian Assassin
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a weapon to silence whoever they were pointed at. [PAWN_pronoun] is utterly lethal with a blade, but cares little for what it actually cuts into. As long as it hits something fleshy, [PAWN_pronoun] is satisfied.
